EmailTemplate.name: webinar-risk-management-engine-2014-02-19 EMEA.EMEA.Follow Up.No Shows
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you – webinar with Tosca demo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar - Tricentis Tosca Testsuite: Innovate Faster with the Risk Management Engine
Wednesday, February 19, 2014 1:00 p.m. - 2:00 p.m CET (Berlin, Paris, Vienna, Rome)
Dear {{lead.First Name}},
Thanks for taking the time to attend our webinar, “Tricentis Tosca Testsuite: Innovate Faster with the Risk Management Engine.” We hope you enjoyed it as much as we did. Your participation and engaging questions made all the difference.
If you’re interested in seeing this and other webinars, visit www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts <http://www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts>.
Don’t miss the next webinar – register at http://www.tricentis.com/about/events/tricentis-webinar-series <http://www.tricentis.com/about/events/tricentis-webinar-series>.
Best wishes,
The Tricentis Team
